name: bunny bye-bye
description:
tiny puzzle game starring a tiny lonely friend made for wholesome jam 2022!  

you control bobe, the little alien as they clean their space station of dust bunnies with their handy clean0tron

controls:

arrow keys / wasd - move

space - jump

control - vacuum

r - reset

credits:

jade ( http://twitter.com/jalunderscore )

  • programming / sound design / music

  • art / writing
